## Name 3 favorite bacteria

1. *Thermophilus aquaticus* 
1. *Wigglesworthia glossinidia*
1. *Lactococcus lactis*


## Explain why they are your favorites

1. Taq polymerase is widely used in polymerase chain reactions.
1. Mutualistically symbiotic with tsetse fly, *Glossina brevipalpis*. Tsetse flies are vectors for trypanosomes.
1. One of several *Lactococcus* species whose fermentation abilities contribute to creme fraiche.
